channel.title: My Compiler ( NEED HELP )
channel.description:
Hello ,
I Am asking for someone to help me with this :
A Message to come up on the compiler once i compiled
and my compiler dosent Compile the welcome text E.G The Welcome message like welcome to ( server name )
Can anyone help ?

item.title: My Compiler ( NEED HELP )
item.dc:creator: @Liam_Baby Liam Baby
item.description:
@Liam_Baby wrote:

[quote=“MrRspsMan, post:5, topic:434783”][quote author=MR Terror link=topic=537499.msg3930311#msg3930311 date=1330624027]
what does it say when its done compiling?-,-
[/quote]

Press any Key to continue …[/quote]

LOL^

It could be the codec in your compiler, try changing the path.

Or you may have put the code in the wrong place

Read full topic

item.title: My Compiler ( NEED HELP )
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

[quote=“MrRspsMan, post:5, topic:434783”][quote author=MR Terror link=topic=537499.msg3930311#msg3930311 date=1330624027]
what does it say when its done compiling?-,-
[/quote]

Press any Key to continue …[/quote]facepalm

try using this for your compiler @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause exit

Of course, adjust the path of your JDK’s javac.exe

Read full topic
